title: Removal of 3,4-dichlorophenol from water utilizing ferrate(VI): kinetic and mechanistic investigations and effects of coexisting anions
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00274A, Paper
Yiwen Luo, Qing Zheng, Zhiyong Luo, Shuqing Xiang, Mei Dai
Fe(VI) has great potential in removing endocrine disrupting chemicals such as 3,4-DCP in water effectively and efficiently.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
